title: The only swing state where Trump is polling ahead
description: CNN's John King breaks down the latest Electoral College projections three weeks away from the 2020 election as Joe Biden holds a double-digit lead in national polling average.

title: Hillary Clinton's loss lingers over Biden's lead
description: Joe Biden leads President Donald Trump nationally and is running ahead or even with him in most swing state polls. He is besting Trump on just about every question atop voters' minds, from the coronavirus and health care to "law and order."

title: See the record-smashing T. rex that sold for $31.8 million
description: STAN, one of the world's most complete T. rex skeletons, sold to an anonymous bidder at auction, far exceeding initial price estimates.

title: CNN's Jake Tapper: History won't be kind to those enabling Trump
description: CNN's Jake Tapper lays out the ways in which President Trump's Cabinet secretaries are making politicized moves ahead of the 2020 presidential election.

title: 'SNL' mocks the VP debate between Kamala Harris, Mike Pence and the fly
description: Last week "Saturday Night Live" took on the first presidential debate between President Donald Trump and Joe Biden.

title: Offered a chance to pivot, Trump chooses denial and recklessness
US and West need to stand solid behind Kyrgyzstan, Central Asia's only democracy
description: Kyrgyzstan, Central Asia's only democratic country, remains mired in political turmoil a week after allegations of electoral interference triggered violent protests.

title: Online shopping turbocharged by pandemic - and there's no going back
description: The coronavirus crisis has divided retail companies into two distinct groups: those with functioning e-commerce businesses, and those without. Many of the have-nots won't survive.

title: Fear sets in that Johnson's Brexit government is ill equipped to handle pandemic
description: It's been another week of difficult headlines for Boris Johnson. Once again, serious questions are being asked of Britain's Prime Minister and his administration's approach to handling the Covid-19 pandemic and, more broadly, the style of government.

title: 'SNL' takes on Vice Presidential debate
description: 'SNL' took on the Vice Presidential debate with Maya Rudolph as Kamala Harris, Beck Bennett as Mike Pence, and a starring turn from the famous housefly.

title: Meghan: I was the most trolled person in the entire world in 2019
description: The Duchess of Sussex has told a teen podcast how she struggled with being trolled on the internet, an issue many teens face on a regular basis, particularly during the coronavirus pandemic when people are more isolated.

title: As the US President spoke on a White House balcony, it was clear his illness has taught him very little
description: As President Donald Trump stood on a White House balcony Saturday — spewing mistruths about his opponent's plan for policing and claiming the coronavirus is "disappearing" while hundreds of people watched from below — it was clear that his illness has taught him very little and he will continue to endanger Americans until Election Day.

title: Azerbaijan and Armenia accuse each other of breaking ceasefire
description: A temporary ceasefire between Azerbaijan and Armenia that came into effect Saturday after almost two weeks of fighting over the disputed Nagorno-Karabakh region appears fragile, with both countries accusing each other of violating the terms of the agreement.

title: 20 killed on temple trip in Thailand as bus and train collide
description: A bus heading to a Buddhist temple collided with a train in central Thailand on Sunday, killing at least 20 people dead and injuring 30, authorities said.

title: Filmmakers unearth a long trail of racism in 'Driving While Black'
description: The tragic stories seem endless. Sandra Bland dies in a jail cell days after a traffic stop.  Philando Castile is pulled over by police and within minutes he is dead. Rayshard Brooks, who had fallen asleep at the wheel of his car and failed a field sobriety test, is fatally shot.

title: California wildfires ravage dozens of family-run wineries
description: The sight is every winemaker's nightmare.

title: Meet the woman with enough Eminem tattoos to set a world record
description: Nikki Patterson knows she's a Stan.

title: An Iraqi teen with autism expresses himself through color. He draws in black since his mother got Covid-19
description: Nahla al-Nadawi's voice is filled with love as she gently asks her son why the flower he drew is black.

title: Turkey's combative foreign policy could soon reach a dead end
description: Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan has for nearly two decades taken strides to transform Ankara's place in the world. Today, his dreams seem further from reach than ever before.

title: Autistic teen draws in black after mom got Covid-19
description: Nahla al-Nadawi's 19-year-old son Ussayid is autistic and expresses himself through colorful artwork. Since caring for his mother and stepfather while they were sick with Covid-19, his drawings have taken a somber turn. CNN's Arwa Damon reports.

title: More arrests in Wisconsin on fourth night of protests over Alvin Cole's death
description: Protesters occupied the Wauwatosa, Wisconsin, city hall lawn Saturday and blocked traffic on the fourth night of demonstrations over the fatal police shooting of Alvin Cole, police said.

title: 22-year-old woman describes life with teen brother after losing both parents to virus
description: For many Gen Zers and Millennials, the coronavirus pandemic has not only affected their financial stability, but has had a devastating impact on their health and families as well. CNN's Kyung Lah reports.

title: Data scientist explains dangers of trying for herd immunity
description: Dr. Chris Murray, Director at the University of Washington's Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation, explains why it's dangerous to try for herd immunity from coronavirus as the pandemic rages on.

title: The small-town takeout store worker who won over New Zealand -- and the world
description: It's Friday night in the small town of Morrinsville and a handful of locals are waiting at the Golden Kiwi on the main street for a greasy parcel of fish and chips.

title: China is winning the global economic recovery
description: While much of the world scrambles to prevent new coronavirus cases from stalling the fragile recovery from recession, China's economy is hitting its stride again and will end the year more influential than ever.

title: Joe Biden makes appeal to disaffected Republican and independent voters
description: Joe Biden is making a clear attempt to appeal to disaffected Republicans and independent voters in the final weeks of the election, promising he'd be a president that would work hard not just for those who support him, but also for those who do not.

title: Woman goes into labor and gives birth in the middle of taking the bar exam
description: Taking the bar exam is hard enough, but one Illinois woman took it to the next level by having a baby in the middle of the test.
